definition.para: Name of a department at an organization with which a person is affiliated.

instructions.para: Enter the names of university departments or groups represented in the resource.
Enter historical names, if known, and current names, if appropriate.

customization.para: Enter the names of significant university departments or groups in which the interviewee was involved, as described during the interview.
If available, use form of the department name found at https://www.tacoma.uw.edu/about-uw-tacoma/founding-faculty-program. If not available, use a commonly found form of the name.

If deemed appropriate, add another form of the name (for example, enter both “University of Washington Tacoma Liberal Studies” and “University of Washington Tacoma School of Interdisciplinary Arts and Sciences”).
Not every interview requires a departmental affiliation; enter when it is addressed in the interview.

example.para: University of Washington Tacoma Advisory Board
University of Washington Tacoma Liberal Studies

admin.para: To re-use this property, existing property properties should be reorganized as customizations for UWT-OH, then general properties of this property can be made more universal.

history.created4Coll: University of Washington Tacoma Oral Histories
history.justification: The UWT Oral Histories project interviewed university-related people and wanted to index their department affiliations at the university.
